events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the engineering department based on your skills in software development.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile to assist you through the interview process for the engineering role.
Our team completed the initial screening of your software engineering application and we are impressed with your background.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions. We appreciate your enthusiasm for the engineering position.
Your technical interview for the software engineer role has been scheduled for the coming week. Please prepare accordingly.
